title: The Mad Prince's Distorted Love Prisoner ~ A Genderbent Knight
description:
Warning: This manga contains Rape & Sexual Violence. 
Read at your own risk!

Elsaid the Knight, who returned after defeating a monster, requesting to marry the royal princess & become parts of the royal family as a reward.

The 1st prince, Viktorich, welcomes Elsaid and invites him to a grand banquet.

The princess offered a toast, after drinking Elsaid fell unconscious and when he wakes up, he has turned into a woman. 

Viktorich whispered,  “I’ll make you a member of the royal family if you give birth to an heir from either one of our 4 princes”.
